document_data.mainbody: '"Adera Moonfist"''' was a disguised [[intellect devourer]] in the [[Moonsea]] region.
document_data.Personality: Like its master, the [[mind flayer]] [[Vanquo]], its main goal was to acquire an artifact from the [[Elemental Plane of Earth]].{{Cite adventurers league/Bounty in the Bog|15}}
document_data.History:
In [[1491 DR]], after Vanquo had absorbed all information from [[Adera Moonfist]], it replaced her brain with an intellect devourer. The intellect devourer began recruiting mercenaries and adepts of the [[Cult of the Black Earth]] to aid in the search for the [[Turning Key]]'s treasure in the [[Flooded Forest]]. The intellect devourer commanded the mercenaries to start preying upon caravans along the [[North Road]], hoping to gain information.{{Cite adventurers league/Bounty in the Bog|5}}

However, an adventuring party hired to clear the area of bandits confronted and defeated "her".
